title: 1910 Turkey red T3 #88 Harry Coveleski PR SOLD

posts.post_title: 1910 Turkey red T3 #88 Harry Coveleski PR SOLD
posts.post_content:
"period trim" 1/8 across top, some shmutz on ball as well, does not appear to be paperloss, tackholes at top an bottom looking for 75$ BO SOLD @ 70
